channel.title: Girls
channel.description: Ok, I have not experience with girls what so ever. Today I was sitting in the bus, on my usual trip home and a girl was sitting in front of my facing away from me. She often looked at me, and when I sat down behind her she began playing with her hair. Does that mean anything at all? I somehow recall that it means a girl is interested in someone if she does that, but I might make the truth more positive for my well-being. As I said, I have no experience with girls, but what I do know is that it was a nice looking girl. I didn't have the balls to say anything to her because she might aswell be pissed off at me or whatever.

item.title: Girls
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:82, topic:235974”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=311268.msg2488503#msg2488503 date=1223964540]

how was it? taste good? i might try it. where do you live?

What the fuck. :\

I think he is trying to mock you about being homosexual which is pretty fucking lame, it’s your way of life.

Honestly, at original poster - I know what you’re talking about, but, as others have said. You need to man up and face the fact she isn’t going to act on you, if she rejects you, ok well you had the balls to ask. I myself struggle with girls and have been rejected before, it doesn’t hurt no where near as bad as you think it would.
[/quote]
Oh, okay.
Pfft, doesn’t bother me.
At least I’m getting some. :P[/quote]
obviously lies

item.title: Girls
item.dc:creator: @srt8 srt8
item.description:
@srt8 wrote:

Well hopefully you knew these girls and they weren’t just random girls off the street, because that would be totally weird. But if you know them, just get a normal conversation started and since it’s halloween time, you could be like, “Would you like to go a corn maze or haunted house this saturday?” If she says yes, then cool…no, then oh well, try again

item.title: Girls
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:71, topic:235974”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=311268.msg2486471#msg2486471 date=1223861205]

i gave the best advice to him, yet no-one listens. why do i bother?

Because they are all idiots.
[/quote]And

  1. it’s for him to decide if you gave the best advice.

  2. “no-one” has to listen. the only person that should listen is the person you’re giving your advice to.

sorry but does [quote]dude, this is a fucking forums for people who code and shit. how many answers do you expect to get out of here? for all anybody knows here, if a girl sits next to you and her arm touches yours means coming onto you, seriously.[/quote] count as good advice.

and for point 2, you may find it hard to believe but people on this forum are probably in the same situation and will want to know a different directive for it. hence the term we all use for idiots, like yourself, the term being “gtfo and search”.[/quote]Just because you give your opinion and it’s more logical according to what “you” think doesn’t mean everyone else thinks it. That’s where i was going with that. I wan’t being an ass, like yourself, I was simply stating common sense. And I said “no-one” has to listen because your advice was directed toward the thread creator. I didn’t think of the possibility that you were trying to direct it to everyone.

Anyways, some good advice would be for him (or anyone in this situation) to talk to her. Don’t wait for a sign. Life doesn’t give you signs to wait on.

Read full topic
